ygData.subject: RE: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: Those skeles in Everfrost are part of a new brewing related quest. Anthem Dirgemaker 26th level bard and merchant Solusek Ro Gotta go get my new song!
ygData.messageBody:
Those skeles in Everfrost are part of a new brewing related quest.

Anthem Dirgemaker
26th level bard and merchant
Solusek Ro

Gotta go get my new song!

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Justin L. Cummings [mailto:cummingsj@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 17, 1999 9:35 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
>
>
> From: "Justin L. Cummings" <cummingsj@...>
>
> <g> You may want to check out everfrost... some of the recent additions
> include vengeful lyrist, vengeful composer, and vengeful soloist (can't
> remember exactly) but they drop pages from a diary of which go away on log
> off) from someone (guessing a bard of that I can't remember). These undead
> skelatons con green to me at 20 and will still attack (terrorize the young
> shamens and barbarians). But due to their recent addion, and
> these pages of
> diary that they drop may hold some key to the quest that you are speaking
> of.... (new item, new beasts, Lute of Gypsy Princess, vengeful soloists'..
> only drawing un-educated conlcusions). It may offer help to
> check everfrost
> out for that or maybe another bard quest.. I don't know.. Ideas?
>
>
> Ruas of The Republic of Freeport
> - The 20 th Circle (for the 8th time this week .. lol), Xegony
>
> ps.. btw Whenever anyone would like to drop some medium bronze my way, go
> right ahead (whould trade an archielogist bag and other junk) ..
> and I love
> the little (rather large sometimes) goblin trains of Permafrost.. such a
> great zone :P
>
>
